price: Say, “The angel of death, who is in charge of you, will take your souls, then to your Lord you will be brought back.”
arabic: ۞ قُلۡ يَتَوَفَّىٰكُم مَّلَكُ ٱلۡمَوۡتِ ٱلَّذِي وُكِّلَ بِكُمۡ ثُمَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُمۡ تُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
